name: ghostd
text: Ray does not know how to lay off people.

name: nilehus
text:
It intrigues me that your comment is the first one, yet also indented.

And what would Ray have done if Teoder had actually come in? You can't hang up on someone in real life.

name: zapatos
text: You're missing out.

name: shmuckeles
text: It's pretty good foreshadowing of how he handles the fallout from Jaime the Science friend

name: redmange
text: And the fallout from Goth Night

name: zem
text: A comment left by zem was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by goocifer, Connellingus, hikikomori, TheLoneliestMonkey, scraggg, miaou)

name: origotoshi
text: He probably just figured that as long as he makes the call, it counts, whether or not she heard it. Later, if she complains about the absence with no notice, he'll insist he called.

name: tetrisattack
text: A comment left by tetrisattack was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by joeyramoney, JuanCarlos, Darthemed)

name: ibetso
text:
This should be rated way higher. People, how magnificent is Ray in panels 3 & 4? I say very magnificent.
A super-smarmy management moment reminiscent of Gary Cole in Office Space. And panel 9 is even funnier .

name: stuart
text: I just realized I haven't gone to work in two weeks because of this comment! THANKS A LOT!

name: betwixt
text:
ray is not wearing his phonejacket :(
but on the other hand he calls from a different phone.

name: ocarinak
text: Thus we learn that Business!Jacket overrides Phone!Jacket.

name: rowboat
text: Dang. Not even a mixtape. Just all click .

name: tronwell
text: after T butchered his porno expenses what do you expect. BRUTAL.

name: farqussus
text: It would only have been Ray explaining to Teodor that he can't get the CD on to the tape, and hastily adding that Teodor was laid off while fumbling with the stop button.

name: waddlerz
text: Cool? Cool!

name: quantumcasaba
text:
Dear TEODOR,
I am deeply sorry that I HAD TO LAY YOU OFF BUT WE ARE STILL COOL RIGHT?. I know it was my fault. I never meant for this to happen. I never dreamed that it could.
I mean this. I mean every word.
RAY!

name: apricotta
text:
You mean,

-=RAY=-

name: dwade
text: Once Ray gets going, saying the things that must be said, it is hard for him to stop.

name: woodenteeth
text: I have been in Ray's mood. Who am I kidding. I'm always in Ray's mood. I like to avoid conflict. Boo to me.

name: mercuri0us
text: I love how Teodor talks with his eyebrows.

name: bhlaab
text: Teodor's phone is a rectangle
